channel.title: [PI] Skillcape GFX - Help
channel.description:
When i click at the button, it start do skillcape emote and gfx, the emote are working, but the gfx isn't 100%, How to fix?
http://i.imgur.com/CZKrfoK.png
I followed this tutorial: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/233250-refactored-100-skillcape-emotes-gfx-serverside-info-refactored.html
I'll repp++
